title: Ep287 Engineering Crimes
description:
This week, the gals get technical reporting on a dry yet actually fascinating career choice. Topics include da Vinci's genius, a heartbreaking alarm failure, and the infamous sinking of the unsinkable. Get yourself a bottle of Winc's Rome of the North Riesling, maybe don't go to outer space on a cold day, and tune in for Engineering Crimes.

Â For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
